module.name: Fax Configuration Professional
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php. The Fax Pro module adds functionality to the standard FreePBX Fax modue. Outbound faxing can be done through a web interface on your FreePBX system. Simply type in a phone number and upload a PDF. You can optionally set the outgoing PDF to use a locally stored fax coversheet with your faxes; and type in a personal message on the coversheet
module.changelog: 12.0.33 On reties detect FAX_SUCCESS from digium fax module during retries 12.0.32 FREEPBX-8341 11 digit extension number inbound fixes and some tweaks 12.0.31 FREEPBX-8367 syntax error, FREEPBX-8349 check permissions before send 12.0.30 Contact Manager improvements 12.0.29 Contact Manager support 12.0.28 Missed one part 12.0.27 FREEPBX-8245 Device Options missing when editing existing extensions 12.0.26 Use proper licensing technique 12.0.25 Using Fax for Asterisk 12.0.24 FREEPBX-8160 Show status from Asterisk Fax 12.0.23 Contact Manager Support 12.0.22 UCP Cleanup 12.0.21 FREEPBX-7268 Fax are not sent with the actual CID extension. They always use the CID trunk 12.0.20 Fatal bug on install 12.0.19 FREEPBX-7844 Fax retransmission on unanswered call. Fax permanently remain in outgoing folder 12.0.18 FREEPBX-7839 The notification email on outgoing fax result says no status 12.0.17 FREEPBX-7886 FREEPBX-7881 Fixes for Unsupported File formats 12.0.16 Delete faxes after sending 12.0.15 FREEPBX-7835 Fax pro sends even the previous attached document (to wrong recipient!!!) 12.0.14 FREEPBX-7838 Fix time representation 12.0.13 Standardize the layout of the dialog 12.0.12 Licensing Work 12.0.11 Licensing work 12.0.10 More work in UCP 12.0.9 Namespace Faxpro so it doesnt conflict in ARI 12.0.8 One more minor fix for visuals 12.0.7 Cleanup and fixes in UCP 12.0.6 Restructure Parts of UCP 12.0.5 Bump Version for GUI Fix 12.0.4 Fix to the licensed file 12.0.3 Don't copy duplicate functions 12.0.2 Fixes and Additions 12.0.1 UCP Module Addition 2.11.23 Extension Page Settings Saving Issues 2.11.20 Display Issues 2.11.19 JS Issues 2.11.18 UCP Support 2.11.16 Minor Changes Zend Licensing, to avoid potential issues. 2.11.15 Fixes issue where forwarded faxes would add the prefix 2.11.14 Add email notifcation on outbound faxes 2.11.13 Add global option on retry of failed faxes 2.11.12 #7032 - Mark faxes as old when clicking on them in ARI 2.11.11 Add support for retries 2.11.10 Fix issue where localstationid wasn't set on outgoing faxes 2.11.9 Fix issue when writing out routing dialplan 2.11.8 Fix issue with sendfax dialplan not being generated 2.11.7 Fix issue where deleting a company logo will clear other values, such as max pages and excess faxes options 2.11.6 Fix spelling, depend on fax, and don't try to splice dialplan that won't be available 2.11.5 fix spelling 2.11.4 Fix issue with validation of global prefix causing prefix issue
